active_incidents.title: Some users are not receiving 2FA codes via SMS

notes.body: Our upstream provider is still investigating the issue with undelivered 2FA codes via SMS and is actively working on finding a solution. No additional information to share just yet, but we’ll keep you posted as soon we have an update.

Due to issues with an upstream provider, some of our customers are not receiving 2FA codes for login via SMS. We’re keeping a close eye on this, and we’ll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We’re sorry for the disruption.
